singleItemContent: What sort of plants have you grown?
Why do people like plants in their homes?
Would you ever give a plant as a gift?
Describe a plant, flower or tree that you like.
what type of plant, flower or tree it is
where it grows or is usually seen and explain why you like it.
Is it common for people to have gardens where you live?
Do you think it is important to have gardens or parks in our cities?
What are the benefits of spending time in gardens or parks?
What plants are important to the economy of your country?
How can people be encouraged to grow their own food?
Why is it important to conserve the world’s plant species?
